```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


every geom has a default stat; and every stat has a default geom  
```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds) +
  stat_count(aes(x = cut), geom = "bar")

ggplot(data = diamonds) +
  stat_summary(aes(x = cut, y = depth), 
               fun.min = min,
               fun = median, 
               fun.max = max)
```
